column4: Hey guys, I've been wanting to get my hands dirty with Ubuntu (which would be my first time switching to a linux distro), but I can't. The installation freezes before I can see the virtualization from memory. Does anyone know what is goign on?
no i dont... cant you give any specifics regarding your hardware and the ubuntu version your trying to install?
are you using a pata harddrive?
goto control panel ./ sytstem / device manager
